config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

config.text: Allow resulting image dimensions to be larger than the original

configurableConfig.description: Increasing image proportions may result in loss of quality.
configurableConfig.label: Scale Up

script:
for image in "${@}"; do
  old_height="$(../get-image-property 'pixelHeight' "${image}")"

  if [[ "${enlarge}" -eq 0 && "${height}" -gt "${old_height}" ]]; then
    echo "Desired size would result in scaling up, and the option is turned off: ${image}" >&2
    exit 0
  fi
done

for image in "${@}"; do
  /usr/bin/sips --resampleHeight "${height}" "${image}"
done
